MajorClaims.Text: a good co-worker needs to have three most important characteristics such as cooperation, trustworthiness, and fellowship

Claims.Text: the co-workers should believe in fellowship
The co-workers need to trust each other
if the co-workers do not corporate with each other that would be devastating in a work environment

Premises.Text: This helps them to enjoy their work life while building up very strong personal relationships
you spend most of your day at office
If you have a good company in office, it is certainly a blessing
The co-workers should be cooperative with one another
If they do not cooperate, there will be lots of disputes
They should not act on suspicion
he always left office sharp on time without giving any consideration whether the work has been finished or not
I once had a co-worker who was too family conscious
Most of the time, I had to do his work in order to protect him from getting caught to the supervisor who was a very authoritative person
one day I wanted to be off early because I had to take my mother to the doctor
When I requested my co-worker to give a helping hand to finish my work early, he turned down my request giving a silly excuse
From that day onwards I did not offer him any support and finally he was transferred from our department to a distant location as a punishment for his irresponsibility
This is a very important aspect in the work environment
I came across a situation once such that one of my subordinates used to suspect his co-worker for carrying tales to me
To a certain extent his suspicion was valid as his co-worker made several attempts to highlight the drawbacks of him
I never encourage tale carriers as a principle and therefore his co-worker gave up talking ill against him with me
But this mistrust continued and created very unpleasant situations for everybody in my department
